original: I haven't got anything to write about.
translated: Je ne dispose de rien à propos de quoi écrire.

original: She knows that she has no choice.
translated: Elle sait qu'elle n'a pas le choix.

original: All what he said was right.
translated: Tout ce qu'il disait était juste.

original: I drove.
translated: J'ai conduit.

original: I'll be happy to answer your question.
translated: Je serai heureux de répondre à votre question.

original: Allan Kardec is my favorite writer.
translated: Allan Kardec est mon écrivain favori.

original: I hope that you're good.
translated: J'espère que tu vas bien.

original: That was the solution to the problem.
translated: C'était la solution au problème.

original: She is always complaining of her job.
translated: Elle se plaint toujours de son travail.

original: You sound really angry.
translated: Tu as l'air très en colère.

original: We aren't free.
translated: Nous ne sommes pas libres.

original: He's in hot water.
translated: Il est dans la mouise.

original: I can't talk to girls.
translated: Je ne peux pas parler aux filles.

original: Tom is faithful.
translated: Tom est fidèle.

original: I'm going on a business trip.
translated: Je pars en voyage d'affaire.

original: She wants to go to the sea.
translated: Elle veut aller à la mer.

original: It's not always like this.
translated: Ce n'est pas toujours comme ça.

original: You are my property.
translated: Vous êtes ma propriété.

original: Have you ever eaten raw fish?
translated: Avez-vous déjà mangé du poisson cru ?

original: I saw a mouse!
translated: J'ai vu une souris !

original: We ate fresh fruit after dinner.
translated: Nous mangeâmes des fruits frais après le dîner.

original: Please put those chairs away.
translated: Ôtez ces sièges, s'il vous plaît.

original: The niece looks like her aunt.
translated: La nièce ressemble à sa tante.

original: I live in Moscow.
translated: Je vis à Moscou.

original: Is it far from your place?
translated: Est-ce loin de chez toi ?

original: He was ill yesterday.
translated: Hier, il était malade.

original: Tom put the thermometer on the wall.
translated: Tom a mis le thermomètre sur le mur.

original: Consider it.
translated: Penses-y.

original: He tied the twigs into bundles.
translated: Il a attaché les brindilles en fagots.

original: I'm content with my job.
translated: Je suis content de mon emploi.

original: I won't give up because I have something worth fighting for.
translated: Je ne baisserai pas les bras parce que j'ai quelque chose qui vaut la peine d'être défendue.

original: Don't worry. I've got you covered.
translated: Ne vous faites pas de souci ! Je vous couvre.

original: She looked surprised at the letter.
translated: Elle eut l'air surprise par la lettre.

original: She held him by the sleeve.
translated: Elle l'a tenu par la manche.

original: That's what I like about you.
translated: C'est ce que j'aime chez toi.

original: He's enjoying himself.
translated: Il s'amuse.

original: Do you ever think about the time we spent together when we were kids?
translated: Songez-vous parfois au temps que nous avons passé ensemble quand nous étions enfants ?

original: I want to get married and have children.
translated: Je veux me marier et avoir des enfants.

original: My leg got hurt, so I could not walk.
translated: Je me suis blessé à la jambe, je ne pouvais plus marcher.

original: Friends are easy to find, but they're hard to keep.
translated: Les amis sont faciles à trouver mais difficiles à garder.

original: The plane accident cost the lives of 200 people.
translated: L'accident d'avion a coûté la vie à 200 personnes.

original: I'm dubious about claims to speak more than five languages fluently.
translated: J'ai des doutes au sujet des prétentions à parler plus de cinq langues couramment.

original: I'm on the interstate.
translated: Je suis sur l'autoroute.

original: I want them alive.
translated: Je les veux vivantes.

original: I was really surprised.
translated: J'étais vraiment surpris.

original: The meeting is tomorrow.
translated: La réunion est demain.

original: We have a lot to talk about.
translated: Nous avons beaucoup à discuter.

original: Tom is dating my sister.
translated: Tom sort avec ma sœur.

original: Who? Me?
translated: Qui ? Moi ?

original: I have some idea of what happened.
translated: J'ai une idée de ce qui est arrivé.

original: I didn't want to scare you.
translated: Je ne voulais pas vous effrayer.

original: Everybody knows me.
translated: Tout le monde me connait.

original: I will not dwell any longer upon this subject.
translated: Il ne demeurera pas longtemps sous cette menace.

original: How is that possible?
translated: Comment est-ce possible ?

original: Don't take it out on me.
translated: Ne vous en prenez pas à moi.

original: According to some historians, the ability of human beings to master fire was the greatest technological advance of the Palaeolithic period.
translated: D'après certains historiens, la maîtrise du feu par l'être humain fut la plus grande avancée technologique du Paléolithique.

original: How can I become rich?
translated: Comment puis-je m'enrichir ?

original: Tom and Mary did not want to wait.
translated: Tom et Mary ne voulaient pas attendre.

original: Teaching is learning.
translated: L'enseignement est un apprentissage.

original: Jane is the president's secretary.
translated: Jane est la secrétaire du directeur.

original: Nobody backed up what I said.
translated: Personne ne corrobora mes dires.

original: She can sing better than anybody else in her class.
translated: Elle sait chanter mieux que n'importe qui dans sa classe.

original: Germany adjoins the Netherlands.
translated: L'Allemagne jouxte les Pays-Bas.

original: Get on a horse.
translated: Enfourchez un cheval !

original: We remained paralyzed for hours in a traffic jam.
translated: Nous restâmes paralysés pendant des heures dans un embouteillage.

original: Ziri walked.
translated: Ziri marcha.

original: Tom has begun to look for work.
translated: Tom a commencé à chercher un travail.
